articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: Viswanathan Anand's Rajinikanth Style Welcome As R Ashwin Buys Chess Team - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Ravichandran Ashwin bought stakes in a chess team, as co-owner of American Gambits, which will make its debut in the second season of the Global Chess League.
articles.content: A legend in the world of chess, Viswanathan Anand, welcomed India off-spinner Ravichandran Ashwin to his sport in style as the cricketer became a co-owner of a chess franchise. Ashwin bought stakes o… [+3358 chars]
